resources.string: Null cert file! Provide client certificate file for caInputStream. Launching default insecure connection insteadâ€¦
Failed to connect to MQTT Broker. Something went wrong e.g. connection timeout or firewall problems.
Failed to disconnect MQTT Broker. Something went wrong e.g. connection timeout or firewall problems.
Failed to publish to MQTT Broker. Something went wrong e.g. unrecognized topic or internet connection problems.
You have to provide crt file InputStream to use self signed certificate TLS.
